name: Etsuraku no Gakuen
overview: An investigator has been sent to Amemiya Gakuen, a secret pleasure garden, which only women are allowed to visit. This investigator disappeared. Her friend Yumi must now send someone else to find her and to unfold the mystery which lies behind Amemiya Gakuen... Love Potion is an adult anime-style visual novel. The interaction is confined to context-specific choices, without a permanent set of verb commands. Unlike most other games of this type, there is only one story path and one ending in the game.
